<JD_START>
Job Title: Business Development Manager

Location: Atlanta, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Consulting, Sales

Description:
Hi,
This is Manish Sharma from ClifyX, Inc. I hope you are doing well! ClifyX, Inc. was formed in 1998 and has since provided staffing solutions and services.ClifyX Group is an award-winning IT consulting firm formed in 1998. Our mission is to provide our clients with optimal technology solutions that are effective and within budget.We specialize in helping organizations review their strategic SOW projects and talent needs and implement high-value and cost-effective solutions to increase profitability and efficiency.Cloud, artificial intelligence, data analytics, and compliance aspects of cyber security development are among our consulting capabilities.Kindly respond to this requirement with your resume, contact information, visa status, rate, and current location information to speed up the interview process.
Job Title: Business Development Manager Location: Atlanta, GADuration: Full-Time Permanent
Job Description:Lead, Sell and Manage - Engineering, Manufacturing and IOT Solutions, Services & Products across TRAVEL and TRANSPORTATION Industry, part of Internet of Things and Digital Engineering (IOT&DE) Service line.
• Good understanding of Travel (Hotels, Rental Cars, Cruises, Ships) and Transportation (Rail, Airlines, Airports) Industry Value chain in reference to Engineering, Manufacturing, IOT related solutions & offerings• Provide domain expertise to help shape the solutions, proposal creation and value articulation to customers and prospects.• Carry out market analysis, lead business planning and strategic sales activities, ability to map client / prospect stakeholders, create large deals, monitor, and close such deals to meet TCV and Revenue targets.• Actively engage in the marketplace (including Product partners) to drive awareness of our IoT & DE solutions with targeted clients - tradeshows, research-led thought leadership, client roadshows and workshops, etc.• Seamlessly embed and Work with sales and account teams to expand existing relationship and add new logos for IOTDE in Travel and Transportation Industry• Excellent Customer Relationship skills with existing clients and Prospects.
Qualifications: • 15 – 20 Years of experience with at least 5+ years of managing an Industry Vertical Business Development experience in creating, shaping & selling large scale technology solutions.• Experience and deep domain knowledge in Travel and Transportation Industry.• Experience selling & delivering engineering, digital, Internet of Things, &/or Connected solutions.• Experience of developing and presenting excellent presentations, compelling proposals, value propositions, business cases and complex deal structuring.• Sound Knowledge of Engg, PLM, Connected Services, Asset Management kind of base functions, scaling up to Digital Technologies / Hyperscalers based transformations.• Good technical skills with ability to engage customers with “consultative selling” is essential.• Ability to understand market/customer needs and work with solution teams to help develop innovation solutions for the industry.• Must have - 4 Year bachelor’s degree, Good to have - MBA.

Thanks & Warm Regards, Manish Sharma Cell: (908) 279-1296 Email: manish@clifyx.com

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
